name: Dream Stroller
description:
Dream Stroller is a submission for the GMTK game jam 2020.

In this game, you play as the Sandman. Walking around the infinite Dream Realm to find people who still need to fall asleep. However! The Sandman can only do this if he himself is sleeping!

Without control over his direct Movement, the only thing you can do is try to influence the Sandman's dreams. When he follows those dreams however, that remains to be seen.

Gather points by reaching various types of houses, but avoid those pesky Nightmares! No one likes those!
